attributes.action: TO MAKE DRUG USERS TAKE DRUG TESTS BEFORE THERE RESEVE BENIFITS
attributes.additional_details: I THINK ITS TIME THAT DRUG AND DRINK ADDITICS WERE MADE TO TAKE A DRUG AND ALCOHOL TEST TO SHOW THERE ARE CLEAN BEFORE THERE RESEVE THEIR BENIFITS . AS A LOT OF WORKING MEN/WOMAN HAVE TO PROVE THERE ARE CLEAN TO GO WORK TO EARN THE MONEY TO PAY FOR THE DRUGS AND ALCOHOL AND ITS ABOUT TIME  IT CHANGED SO COME SHOW YOUR SUPPORT AND SING FOR IT TO CHANGE .
